speeches.speech: Good morning, Christopher. Welcome back. An exellent job you have done.

Your last cracking revealed that the country J is building a new AI controled war machine. ^The war machine can target enemies automatically, which is obviously not complaint with the Three Laws of Robotics. ^This is a serious issue then. We will never leave the lives of the human in the hand of machines. ^So this time, your mission is to infiltrate into the computer system of country J. ^We have already performed Man-In-The-Middle attack, and we will maintain this state during your intrusion.
` Are you ready for your intrusion?

Sniffing attack is the major form of attack that we will use. At success, you will get the credential of ArtificialCore partner. ^Nevertheless, your rival may use hash or other techniques to hamper your sniffing. ^Dictionary attack is one of the ways you can use to crack the hashing. With the hashing cracked, you can sniff the credential successfully. ^The rainbow table will takes up a large storage space on your computer, but it will accelerate the your speed of dictionary attack.

You might just want to use Brtute-force attack to try out the password in an try-and-error manner, independent of our Man-In-The-Middle. ^It's not recommended. After all, Brute-force attack is inefficient. What's more, the defensive AI may apply some techniques against this effort.

One of the possible method against our repetitive password trial is to enforce an limit for wrong passwords. ^However, we can then make use of it, to delibrately insert wrong passwords so as to lock the account of the innocent victim.
Just as I said, HackIt is a terrific place for the talented, isn't it.

Zero-day attack is overwhelming! You exploit a flaw in code that no one have ever discovered, and therefore, no one is ready to defend. ^The problem of apply Zero-day attack is that you have to find a new flaw yourself. ^This process will take much of your effort, so, use it if necessary.

When you find it hard to sniff the partner's credential, there is an alternative. ^Replay attack is one that requires no cracking. ^You just intercept the message, assuming its content is as expected, and send the message again, as it was. ^It has not grant you as much valuable information as sniffing attack though, but it still deals damange to the target, and you earns.
